details_form.overview:
We need some information about you to track your period details.
Please use /cancel to stop at any stage.
details_form.get_name:
Please enter your full name.
Only alphabets and spaces are allowed.
details_form.get_cycle_length:
Enter your cycle length in days.
Cycle length refers to the time between two periods.
details_form.cycle_length_invalid: Please enter a valid cycle length
details_form.cycle_length_out_of_bounds:
Looks like the cycle length you entered is incorrect.

Please enter a valid number between 16 to 60.
details_form.get_period_length:
Enter your period length in days.
Period length refers to the time between period start and end.
details_form.period_length_invalid: Please enter a valid period length
details_form.period_length_out_of_bounds:
Looks like the period length you entered is incorrect.

Please enter a valid number between 1 to 15.
details_form.get_last_date: Enter your last period date in the format dd/mm/yyyy
details_form.last_date_future: The date of last period cannot be a future date. Please enter a valid date.
details_form.last_date_earlier_than_90: The date of last period cannot be earlier than 90 days from today. Please consult a doctor if the date is correct. Otherwise enter a valid date.
